description:
Reentrancy in MerklOperatorBase.setAccountInfo(address,address,bytes) (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#104-112):
	External calls:
	- accountOwner = IAccount(account).owner() (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#106)
	- IAccount(account).ACCOUNT_VERSION() < 3 (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#109)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _setAccountInfo(account,accountOwner,initiator,metaData_) (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#111)
		- accountToInitiator[accountOwner][account] = initiator (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#124)
	- _setAccountInfo(account,accountOwner,initiator,metaData_) (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#111)
		- metaData[account] = metaData_ (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#125)

description:
Low level call in MerklOperatorBase.skim(address) (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#163-170):
	- (success,result) = address(msg.sender).call{value: address(this).balance}() (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#165)
Variable MerklOperatorBase.ARCADIA_FACTORY (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#25) is not in mixedCase
Variable MerklOperatorBase.MERKL_DISTRIBUTOR (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperatorBase.sol#28) is not in mixedCase

MerklOperator.claim(address,MerklOperator.InitiatorParams) (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperator.sol#180-236) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- reward == 0 (src/merkl-operator/MerklOperator.sol#218)

Reentrancy in YieldClaimer.claim(address,YieldClaimer.InitiatorParams) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#182-207):
	External calls:
	- accountToInitiator[IAccount(account_).owner()][account_] != msg.sender (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#188)
	- IAccount(account_).flashAction(address(this),actionData) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#203)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- account = address(0) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#206)
	YieldClaimer.account (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#37) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- YieldClaimer.claim(address,YieldClaimer.InitiatorParams) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#182-207)
	- YieldClaimer.executeAction(bytes) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#216-250)
	- YieldClaimer.onSetAssetManager(address,bool,bytes) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#112-119)
	- YieldClaimer.setAccountInfo(address,address,address,uint256,bytes) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#129-144)
	- YieldClaimer.skim(address) (src/cl-managers/yield-claimers/YieldClaimer.sol#319-328)
